name: Software Developer
description: Designs, builds, and maintains computer programs. Collaborates with teams to create software applications that solve real-world problems.
required_skills: Programming languages (Python, Java, JavaScript), Problem-solving, Debugging, Software design, Version control, Communication

name: Data Scientist
description: Analyzes complex data to help organizations make better decisions. Combines statistics, mathematics, and programming to extract insights from data.
required_skills: Python, R, Statistics, Machine Learning, Data Visualization, SQL, Critical thinking

name: UX/UI Designer
description: Creates user-friendly and visually appealing digital interfaces. Focuses on enhancing user satisfaction through improved usability and accessibility.
required_skills: User research, Wireframing, Prototyping, Visual design, Figma/Sketch, Empathy, Communication

name: Marketing Manager
description: Develops and implements marketing strategies to promote products or services. Analyzes market trends and manages campaigns across various channels.
required_skills: Strategic planning, Market research, Campaign management, Social media, SEO/SEM, Analytics, Communication

name: Financial Analyst
description: Evaluates financial data to help businesses make investment decisions. Analyzes market trends, company financials, and economic conditions.
required_skills: Financial modeling, Excel, Accounting principles, Data analysis, Report writing, Attention to detail

name: Human Resources Manager
description: Oversees the human resources department and develops HR strategies aligned with organizational goals. Manages recruitment, employee relations, and HR policies.
required_skills: Recruitment, Employee relations, Conflict resolution, HR policies, Communication, Leadership, Emotional intelligence

name: Project Manager
description: Plans, executes, and closes projects while ensuring they are completed on time and within budget. Coordinates teams and resources to achieve project goals.
required_skills: Planning, Budgeting, Risk management, Team leadership, Stakeholder management, Problem-solving, Communication

name: Cybersecurity Analyst
description: Protects computer systems and networks from security breaches. Monitors for threats, implements security measures, and responds to incidents.
required_skills: Network security, Vulnerability assessment, Security tools, Incident response, Risk analysis, Programming basics

name: Content Writer
description: Creates written content for various platforms including websites, blogs, and social media. Researches topics and adapts writing style for different audiences.
required_skills: Writing, Editing, Research, SEO knowledge, Content strategy, Creativity, Time management

name: Healthcare Administrator
description: Manages healthcare facilities, services, and staff. Ensures compliance with healthcare laws and regulations while improving operational efficiency.
required_skills: Healthcare regulations, Budgeting, Staff management, Strategic planning, Communication, Problem-solving

name: Business Analyst
description: Analyzes business processes and systems to identify areas for improvement. Bridges the gap between business needs and technology solutions.
required_skills: Requirements gathering, Process analysis, Data analysis, Documentation, Communication, Critical thinking

name: Product Manager
description: Oversees the development and marketing of a product throughout its lifecycle. Defines product vision, strategy, and features based on market research and user feedback.
required_skills: Product strategy, Market research, User experience, Technical knowledge, Stakeholder management, Prioritization

name: Cloud Architect
description: Designs and implements cloud computing solutions for organizations. Develops cloud strategies, selects appropriate platforms, and ensures security and scalability.
required_skills: Cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP), Network design, Security, Virtualization, Programming, Solution architecture

name: Environmental Scientist
description: Studies environmental issues and develops solutions. Collects and analyzes data about air, water, soil, and other natural resources.
required_skills: Scientific research, Data analysis, Environmental regulations, Field work, Technical writing, Problem-solving

name: Digital Marketing Specialist
description: Implements online marketing strategies across various digital channels. Manages social media, email campaigns, SEO, and paid advertising.
required_skills: SEO/SEM, Social media marketing, Content creation, Email marketing, Analytics, Digital advertising platforms
